workflows.creator: 0c145cd5-0a3a-480f-bd7e-2cc8a66fd232
workflows.title: Subflow Process change orders per subscription
workflows.description:
Processes the given change orders related to a unique subscription.
This subflow is part of the "Process change orders" process.

subscription.title: subscription
subscription.description: Subscription Id to limit processing to 1 subscription only. It is needed to speed up E2Es.

message.value: The parent subscription ({$.steps.call-workflow-7.response.url}/app/accounting/subscription/subscription.nl?id={$.steps.loop-2.value.subscription}) is terminated and this opportunity may no longer be valid.

http-client-2.title: Trigger TEMPO
http-client-2.description: Triggers 'On Draft NS Renewal Subscription Created/Updated, Create/Update SF Renewal Opportunity'

call-workflow-7.title: Get NS metadata
call-workflow-7.description: Retrieves the NS metadata for the current environment.

call-workflow-6.title: Add Note to Opp
call-workflow-6.description: Add a note to the opportunity's Description with the reason the subscription status is not synced.

message.value: The corresponding subscription ({$.steps.call-workflow-7.response.url}/app/accounting/subscription/subscription.nl?id={$.steps.loop-2.value.subscription}) is terminated, however, there is another renewal subscription ({$.steps.call-workflow-7.response.url}/app/accounting/subscription/subscription.nl?id={$.steps.netsuite-3.response.body.items[0].id}) for the same parent, hence this opportunity was not updated.

http-client-1.title: Trigger TEMPO
http-client-1.description: Triggers 'On Draft NS Renewal Subscription Created/Updated, Create/Update SF Renewal Opportunity'

script-12.title: Get TEMPO urls
script-12.description: Determines the URLs for activation/deactivation for TEMPO.

salesforce-2.title: Find Opp
salesforce-2.description: Find opp for the subscription change order created for and add a message to it about skipping the opp update because another renewal was found.

script-2.title: Preprocess change orders
script-2.description: Preprocesses change orders by splitting them by the action, returning activation orders and termination orders. Both change orders have a different process.

trigger.title: Async call
trigger.description:
Processes the given change orders related to a unique subscription.
This subflow is part of the "Process change orders" process.

dependencies.name: Trigger On NS Sub Activation Set SF Opportunity Subscription Status
Trigger On NS Sub Termination Set SF Opportunity Subscription Status
